data.title: Lunch with colleagues
data.text: The Longhorn is a typical Texas cafe restaurant with steak, lunchen and dinner specials, and good chicken fried steak. Arrive early for lunch as it fills up quickly

data.title: Late dinner
data.text: It was okay but my steak was too "well done" dry, steamed veggies over cooked, but wait staff good. We did get what we ordered & in a timely manner. It was loud and had same thing on all the tv, not a variety.

data.title: You won't go away hungry from here. Reallygood eats!
data.text:
We visited friends and said this place is a MUST.  If you like Chicken Fried Sreak, it is the best I've ever had. Everything prepared from scratch.  Steak was chrispy, meat tender and large.  Sides of mac n cheese and green beans, and they were generous.
Other sides offered for you to pick. Baked potatoes only offer two days per week.

data.title: Pretty average but nice atmosphere
data.text: I thought the food was average at best though I did like the atmosphere of the place. Pretty unremarkable steaks for a "steak house," but there other options as well.

data.title: Great Food, Trashy Men's Restroom
data.text: This pertains to the new location on 201 E 24th St. The listing on Trip Advisor has to old address and I can't change it.  We've been dining at the Longhorn Tavern in Bryan for nearly 20 years.  Last night we dined there, and while the food was very good, I was very disappointed when I walked into the men's room.  It was so trashed out that I took a photo of it and showed it to the owner.  His excuse was that it is a football weekend.  I told him that was no excuse that that I expected better than that if I'm going to dine there.  I believe this is new management.  I do hope he improves this area, because it is my contention that dirty bathrooms may be a sign of a dirty kitchen as well.

data.title: Lunch
data.text: Great food! I had the club sandwich which was huge and delicious! My husband has the Chicken fried steak and I tried a bite, usually I don't like it, but theirs was amazing. I think when we go back I will get the Chicken fried steak for sure. Great visit for our first time.

data.title: Service sucks
data.text: Overall the food is ok but the service sucks! Service is always hit or miss here mostly a miss. Needs to be more teamwork in this place for as many workers they have. We waited too long to be greeted at our table. We were beginning to wonder if we should just leave. Finally, she came took order and brought our order, and never checked back! We had to track her down to get our ticket! We have eaten here 3 or 4  times and it's always the same on service, so for that reason won't be back! Here's a tip,  hire someone to train your waitstaff how to wait tables and assign sections to your waitstaff so they will know what tables to keep up with and teach your hostesses to greet people friendly when you come in!

data.title: Great Food
data.text: We're in Bryan for a soccer tournament and this place was recommended. Great steak and very affordable. Ended up going twice during our stay.

data.title: Great food and service
data.text: I started eating at Longhorn when it was in it's old location. Food & service has always been good. Steaks are good and so are hamburgers and salads. My friends & family love their chicken fried steak.

data.title: A Popular Place
data.text: The Longhorn Tavern Steakhouse, located adjacent to the Brazos County Courthouse, is a popular restaurant frequented by locals, from blue collar workers to prominent businessmen and court personnel.  On my recent visit I took a professor from a Polish University.  He thoroughly enjoyed to atmosphere and the food, and I was appreciative of the friendly and attentive service.  This is why I always keep coming back to the Longhorn.

data.title: Excellent Food but Inattentive Service
data.text:
My wife had recommended that we check it out based on a recommendation from a friend at church.  

We started out with Texas Toothpicks and Cheese Fries with Bacon. Both were very good and large portions which forced us to share a small Chicken Fried Steak with a side of Macaroni & Cheese and Green beans

However the real reason we came was for the pies which we ordered for taking home with us. Super delicious!!!

The only drawback was the inattentive server who we had to flag down twice. This was during and after the lunch crowd had pretty much thinned out and we arrived. She seemed harried while serving us as well as others.

data.title: Texas Food
data.text: Food is very good.  The chicken fried steak is my husband's favorite and mine is the delicious catfish

data.title: Ain't what it used to be
data.text:
I used to love to come here for lunch I would come about ones a week it was fast and friendly never did I feel rushed.
The last time I went to this restaurant I waited 10 minutes just to be seated I waited another 6 or 7 minutes just to take my drink order another 6 to 7 minutes to get my drink are you starting to get the picture. My food finally came before I even took a bite of my food my waitress brought me my check and I never saw her again I had to flag someone down just to get a drink refill.

data.title: food so so but nice  back room
data.text: We enjoyed dining at the Longhorn Tavern Steak House.  The food was okay.  I found it a tad greasy, but the taste was okay.  We borrowed their back room.  It is a huge back room, fitting our forty people easily.  We began our gathering at 1 pm on a busy Saturday and they did not charge us.  They also let us bring in a large cake, which some restaurants would not let us do.  This was very very nice.  The atmosphere of the restaurant is good.  I would rate Longhorn Tavern Steak House with a 5 for atmosphere, and nice people that work there, but I am giving it an overall rating of 3 because I found the food to be so-so.

data.title: A real Texas treat!
data.text: I broke away from ordering the specialty, chicken fried steak, and was not disappointed with fried catfish.  That was delicious combined with a tossed salad and fries.  Fun atmosphere!

data.title: Love the atmosphere!!!
data.text: The people were great! The steak is excellent, I had the the rib eye, med-rare and its not too pricy. Will go again. Oh and good drinks!!!!

data.title: Enjoyable Lunch with Friend
data.text: A friend from out-of-town visited me in Bryan for the purpose of having lunch, and I suggested the Longhorn Tavern, which always had good lunches.  He was not disappointed with the Chicken Fried Steak and I enjoyed my Hamburger Steak with grilled onions.  Too, the salads were fresh, and the service was quick and attentive.  This restaurant is plenty of parking.  I've eaten at the restaurant on a number of occasions and I have never been disappointed.

data.title: Good Lunch with Friends
data.text: Out-of-town friends came to Bryan for lunch, and I took them to the Longhorn Tavern Steak House.  The service was attentive and friendly and the food was delicious.  The hamburger steak with grilled onions was exceptionally good, as was the chicken fried steak.  The salads are always fresh.  The Longhorn has a small parking lot and there is more than enough parking available on the streets.  This restaurant is popular with the locals and the courthouse crowd.

data.title: Must visit!
data.text: Very good food! Decent price! Great atmosphere. A little off the beaten path but was a very good adventure!  We walked from the Lasalle motel. The place was packed when we arrived. We chose to have a seat at the bar and we were quickly waited on!  They also have a nice patio out front for dinning that is smoker friendly. Thank you Chace and the rest of staff for the awesome service!

data.title: Always Great
data.text: We eat here a couple of times a year when in town.  Always a great experience  and awesome food!  The service has always been above and beyond.
